snippet: Susan G. Komen for the Cure is still working to restore the support and financing it lost in the outcry over its attempt to eliminate grants to Planned Parenthood.
abstract: Susan G Komen for the Cure is still working to restore the support and financing it lost in the outcry over its attempt to eliminate grants to Planned Parenthood; several academics, crisis communications consultants and cause marketing experts say group needs to take more drastic action.
lead_paragraph: Susan G. Komen for the Cure is still working to restore the support and financing it lost in the outcry over its attempt to eliminate grants to Planned Parenthood.

headline.seo: Komen Foundation Works to Regain Support After Planned Parenthood Controversy
headline.main: Komen Foundation Struggles to Regain Wide Support
headline.print_headline: Komen Foundation Struggles to Regain Wide Support
